dcterms:description: The Lost and Found dataset (LAFD) is the only publicly available dataset that focuses on discovering small obstacles and lost cargo on roads. It records 13 different challenging street scenarios and 37 different obstacles, split into a training subset and a testing subset, containing 1,036 images in the training/validation set and 1,068 images in the testing set.
dcterms:title: Lost and Found Dataset (LAFD)

dcterms:description: The Marine Obstacle Detection Dataset (MODDv2) is a realistic, publicly available dataset for Unmanned Surface Vehicles (USVs), comprising IMU data and annotated stereo videos with polygons annotating water and bounding boxes annotating obstacles. It contains 28 video sequences with a total of 11,675 frames.
dcterms:title: Marine Obstacle Detection Dataset (MODDv2)
